explanation:
Global Witness is an international NGO that investigates the exploitation of natural resources and its impact on human rights and corruption. It campaigns against the fossil fuel industry and lobbies for environmental protections. I have used the information from their website and wikipedia to inform my decision. 

[https://www.globalwitness.org/en/](https://www.globalwitness.org/en/)
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Witness)

SOCAR (State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan) is a state-owned oil and gas company. The company is involved in the exploration, production, processing, refining, and sale of oil, gas, and related products. SOCAR operates oil refineries, gas processing plants, and pipeline networks. I am classifying SOCAR as a fossil fuel company because it is involved in the extraction, production, and sale of oil and gas. See: [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR)

Lenovo is a multinational technology company that specializes in designing, manufacturing, and marketing consumer electronics, personal computers, software, servers, and related services. It is not involved in the fossil fuel industry, is not a conservation group, a government department, or an educational institution. I am basing this classification on the search results for 'Lenovo' which describe their business activities ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenovo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenovo), [https://www.lenovo.com/us/en/](https://www.lenovo.com/us/en/)).
